G

getLooper() - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
 

H

hasMessages(int) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Check if there are any pending posts of messages with code 'what' in the message queue.
hasMessages(int, Object) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Check if there are any pending posts of messages with code 'what' and whose obj is 'object' in the message queue.

O

org.daimhim.weakhandler - 程序包 org.daimhim.weakhandler
 

P

post(Runnable) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Causes the Runnable r to be added to the message queue.
postAtFrontOfQueue(Runnable) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Posts a message to an object that implements Runnable.
postAtTime(Runnable, long) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Causes the Runnable r to be added to the message queue, to be run at a specific time given by uptimeMillis.
postAtTime(Runnable, Object, long) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Causes the Runnable r to be added to the message queue, to be run at a specific time given by uptimeMillis.
postDelayed(Runnable, long) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Causes the Runnable r to be added to the message queue, to be run after the specified amount of time elapses.

R

removeCallbacks(Runnable) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Remove any pending posts of Runnable r that are in the message queue.
removeCallbacks(Runnable, Object) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Remove any pending posts of Runnable r with Object token that are in the message queue.
removeCallbacksAndMessages(Object) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Remove any pending posts of callbacks and sent messages whose obj is token.
removeMessages(int) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Remove any pending posts of messages with code 'what' that are in the message queue.
removeMessages(int, Object) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Remove any pending posts of messages with code 'what' and whose obj is 'object' that are in the message queue.

S

sendEmptyMessage(int) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Sends a Message containing only the what value.
sendEmptyMessageAtTime(int, long) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Sends a Message containing only the what value, to be delivered at a specific time.
sendEmptyMessageDelayed(int, long) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Sends a Message containing only the what value, to be delivered after the specified amount of time elapses.
sendMessage(Message) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Pushes a message onto the end of the message queue after all pending messages before the current time.
sendMessageAtFrontOfQueue(Message) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Enqueue a message at the front of the message queue, to be processed on the next iteration of the message loop.
sendMessageAtTime(Message, long) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Enqueue a message into the message queue after all pending messages before the absolute time (in milliseconds) uptimeMillis.
sendMessageDelayed(Message, long) - 类 中的方法org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Enqueue a message into the message queue after all pending messages before (current time + delayMillis).

W

WeakHandler - org.daimhim.weakhandler中的类
Memory safer implementation of android.os.Handler Original implementation of Handlers always keeps hard reference to handler in queue of execution.
WeakHandler() - 类 的构造器org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Default constructor associates this handler with the Looper for the current thread.
WeakHandler(Handler.Callback) - 类 的构造器org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Constructor associates this handler with the Looper for the current thread and takes a callback interface in which you can handle messages.
WeakHandler(Looper) - 类 的构造器org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Use the provided Looper instead of the default one.
WeakHandler(Looper, Handler.Callback) - 类 的构造器org.daimhim.weakhandler.WeakHandler
Use the provided Looper instead of the default one and take a callback interface in which to handle messages.
